title: misc/xcode: can use "xcode-select" to get installation path
body:
by **andy.arvanitis**: 
This is not an error, just an improvement suggestion.

Your colorizer installer script could be a little more robust if it used the
"xcode-select --print-path" command. 

See an example here (your script modified for my language project):

  https://github.com/eerolanguage/eero/blob/master/xcodesupport/Xcode4/Colorizer/eero_colors_xcode.sh

Thanks for creating the script in the first place!

-andy
